nodes.text: Sarn Starbreaker was a Gloovan male who held the rank of Cloud in the Nihil marauder organization, serving within the Tempest of Pan Eyta. Starbreaker and his Cloud led an attack on the Cyclor Shipyards above the planet Cyclor, attempting to destroy the starship Innovator. The Jedi Order, with the assistance of the Cyclorrians, were able to stop the Nihil attack before the Innovator could be damaged, with Padawan Bell Zettifar destroying Starbreaker's Cloudship and killing the Gloovan and his crew.
